task_completion.description: Whether the task was completed successfully or not

valid_actions.description: Number of valid actions taken in a given task

invalid_actions.description: Number of invalid actions taken in a given task

required_steps.description: Number of steps taken to successfully complete the task

thoughtfulness.description: Level of thoughtfulness in planning each action

termination_reasoning.description: Reason for choosing to TERMINATE the task

efficiency.description: Efficiency in completing the task (low number of unnecessary actions)
